name: Where the Water Tastes Like Wine - Fireside Chats
name_original: Where the Water Tastes Like Wine - Fireside Chats
description: In this companion app for Where the Water Tastes Like Wine (https://dimbulbgames.itch.io/where-the-water-tastes-like-wine), hear each character tell you a folk tale from their background or journeys. If you have played Where the Water Tastes Like Wine, these are additional stories for you to enjoy - if not, this is a little taste of a small piece of the game.
